name: MediaTemplate
description: Automatically creates media entries for cabinet files. Simpler than manually authoring Media elements.

CabinetTemplate.description: Template for cabinet file names. {0} is replaced with the cabinet number.

CompressionLevel.description: Level of compression for cabinet files.

EmbedCab.description: Whether to embed cabinet files in the MSI.

MaximumUncompressedMediaSize.description: Maximum size in MB before creating a new cabinet.
